channel.title: RSC Last Chance
channel.description:
"Last, but by no means least, members can get in on the celebrations for 10 years of RuneScape with one last chance to gain access to RuneScape Classic."
Hopefully they will pull their heads out of their asses and open up a f2p server for free.

item.title: RSC Last Chance
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“OldSkoolRSC, post:42, topic:412874”]7 Q) If I log in RuneScape Classic durring the next re-opening time, will all my skills be level 1?

A) Yes, unless you logged in RuneScape Classic before it closed and you were a member when they deleted the F2P accounts.

This doesnt apply to me. I never had membership so my account was deleted. Pity too, i had a mask set i saved.[/quote]
That’s not correct, I still have few of my rsc accounts with all rsc stuff still there.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @dexto dexto
item.description:
@dexto wrote:

[quote=“OldSkoolRSC, post:42, topic:412874”]7 Q) If I log in RuneScape Classic durring the next re-opening time, will all my skills be level 1?

A) Yes, unless you logged in RuneScape Classic before it closed and you were a member when they deleted the F2P accounts.

This doesnt apply to me. I never had membership so my account was deleted. Pity too, i had a mask set i saved.[/quote]
that doesn’t make sense to me…

I wasn’t a member for 4 years while rs2 was their main game, the first classic re-opening back in november 2009, i made my old account members, and i just logged in with all my items and stats…

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Last Chance
item.dc:creator: @dexto dexto
item.description:
@dexto wrote:

OldSkoolRSC:

I just found out i dont have “veteran status” as i never had membership during August 3rd 2005 to February 3rd 2006. That means i would have to start as a lvl 3 again with no items. So, im out.

No you don’t, i can’t login to veteran world either because i haven’t played between those periods, but i can still login the 2 other servers with my old stats.

Read full topic

RuneScape

RuneScape Forum - Community Forums for Clans, Feedback & Discussion

Join the discussion on the official RuneScape forum. Share your thoughts with the community, ask questions, find help, learn about events and much more.

We can also add our support into it, so that it will get seen more & more.

item.title: RSC Last Chance
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

IlikeArrays:

Ill stick around. If we can show jagex it is popular… but they never listen to players. Never have.

Well, it would take alot of organizing to rally everyone back. Im not aware of any effort to do so, perhaps you could spearhead the campaign for us?

If a decent sized playerbase was prepared for this last opening, private servers would not be needed anymore.

EDIT

I didnt mean to pass the buck there, obviously everyone would need to get involved. But its not going to be as successful if there arent any ‘leaders’ organzing and motivating others. Are there any volunteers?

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Last Chance
item.dc:creator: @dexto dexto
item.description:
@dexto wrote:

[quote=“Pompano21, post:27, topic:412874”][quote author=dexto link=topic=514348.msg3734980#msg3734980 date=1314891651]

Get
Over
It
[/quote]why are you here

Why are you here?

why are we here?

where could we be else?

I know where you would rather be.[/quote]
kinky

Taken from the official runescape website:

Final Classic Re-opening

Have you ever sat listening to the old and wizened seers in your clan councils or local fishing spot as they chew gummily on their stewed lobster and go on and on about the “good old days”, telling you stories of certs, sleeping bags and 3-hit combat? Do they look wistfully at areas just beyond the Paterdomus temple saying “I remember when all this was just sea”? Strange tales indeed, but there was a time when their ramblings were true! If you’re a member and you’re keen to find out more about the early days of RuneScape and the game that started it all off, then take a nostalgic trip to RuneScape Classic.

For the last time this month we are reopening the gates to our true roots and humble beginnings. RuneScape Classic is a very basic and old-school version of RuneScape, but does contain 50 of our original quests and the whole game as it was back in 2003. Don’t forget that if you’re keen to unlock the classic cape this will be your final ever opportunity to do this.

Read full topic
